title: help with maining
body: so i dont play fiora much at all really, but i just got a sick pentakill and went 18/5. should i start maining her because im liking her playstyle

replies.body: works really well up to gold before ppl who are genuinely ok at this game start countering your ravenous with a executioners calling or dont waste a move on her invulnerability, good tank tops will also roll you
Fiora is op rn so i guess go for it. Keep in mind she's a one trick champ since her playstyle is unique and you will probably end up struggling on other champs in the future.
You can pretty much main any champ you feel like. All champs are playable at non-professional level regardless of what rank youre in
